com.google.code.uclassify.client
Interface AsyncUClassifyClient

All Superinterfaces:
UClassifyAuthenticationClient, UClassifyCommunicationClient
All Known Implementing Classes:
AsyncUClassifyClientAdapter
public interface AsyncUClassifyClient
extends UClassifyAuthenticationClient

The Interface AsyncUClassifyClient. This interface can be used for asynchronous invocation of API methods.

Author:
Nabeel Mukhtar
